type.name: org.gradle.jvm.JvmBinarySpec
type.description: * Represents a binary artifact that is the result of building a jvm component.

method.name: getClassesDir
method.description: * The classes directory for this binary.

method.name: getResourcesDir
method.description: * The resources directory for this binary.

method.name: getTargetPlatform
method.description: * The target platform for this binary.

method.name: getToolChain
method.description: * Returns the {@link org.gradle.jvm.toolchain.JavaToolChain} that will be used to build this binary.

method.name: setClassesDir
method.description: * Sets the classes directory for this binary.

method.name: setResourcesDir
method.description: * Sets the resources directory for this binary.

method.name: setTargetPlatform
method.description: * Sets the target platform for this binary.

method.name: setToolChain
method.description: * Sets the {@link org.gradle.jvm.toolchain.JavaToolChain} that will be used to build this binary.

property.name: classesDir
property.description: * The classes directory for this binary.

property.name: resourcesDir
property.description: * The resources directory for this binary.

property.name: targetPlatform
property.description: * The target platform for this binary.

property.name: toolChain
property.description: * Returns the {@link org.gradle.jvm.toolchain.JavaToolChain} that will be used to build this binary.
